title: The Three Pillars of NDC - Did We Achieve Them?
excerpt: Cost, Control, and Retail were NDC's founding goals. A decade later, how much progress have we actually made?
author: Ann Cederhall
content:
When IATA filed Resolution 787 in 2013, NDC was built on three foundational pillars: Cost, Control, and Retail. Nearly a decade on, it's worth asking—did we actually achieve any of them?

In this piece, I take a hard look at where we started, where we are now, and why 85% of airlines remain unhappy with their own websites. The answer isn't just about technology.
